summary: My first mod Currently a work in progress
descriptionHtml:
The Next update of this mod will include NPC Fixes, additional NPCs and possibly some merchants.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Message from Vil: If you are CTDing once installing this mod, let me know, and systematically deactivate other mods that you already have installed to let me know which one its clashing with, as to my knowledge it shouldnt as I only used stock items and built on areas not used. If people keep having problems, i shall move all the items to a new file incase i bumped something when copying sections of other maps to remove bugs i was having.

Message from Vil: When you enter the cavern, there are 2 books on pedestals, the one on the left is my log book of work im doing, have done, and will be doing, as well as known bugs and things i would like your input on. The one on the right is the back story, I walked the path from markarth to the darkwater pass yesterday on horseback with my sabrecat companion... attacked by 3 dragons within a matter of 5 minutes 2 of them named haha... tried to make it from the eyes of a dwemer engineer never been to the surface and work out what wouldnt have been there in the time of the dwemer, so.. anything stone except bridges which we can picture them as recent construction.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Things im working on:
1. Quest to obtain the keep once blue face npc bug is fixed by bethesda... See details below
2. Adding NPCs
3. Adding Ore to the mine
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The quest im working on follows something like this:
Steps to get the home...
Start of the game (helgen)
Riverwood
Whiterun
dragon stone
Kill the dragon
obtain breezehome

Here is where the quest begins:

Find and read the book on the bed in breezehome
Head to markarth dwemer museum find the note in one of the cabinets
Read the note
Find the theif in riften (under city)
Kill the theif and obtain his house key
Go to his house and find the in the Theifs Ledger
Read the ledger
Go to winterhold academy
Find the note in the hall of counternance on a shelf
Read the note
Go to solitude hall of the dead
Find the coffin
Open the coffin and obtain the note + some stormcloak officer armor if you want it else leave it thought id add it in
Read the note
Go to windhelm mage room
Find Key + Book on the shelf
Read the Book
Follow the steps along the book if you wish.. or just skip to the end and solve the riddle .. wont make it to hard...
Cross the bridge to the door
Use the Key on the door
Enter the cavern
Cross the bridge

NOTE: The door to the keep is locked as is the Door to the Mine

Find the Keep + Mine key (swim witht he giant snapperfish XD)
Enter the keep
Cull the hordes of sabrecats and fight your way to the bedroom
Find the Book on the bed
Read the book (explains the hordes of sabre cats XD many years of breeding XD)

The house is now yours.. go down the mine if you want or go swimming if you dare XD
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known conflicts:
Ildrameshs Folly - A Valley By Deepfolk Crossing
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9713  - Thanks Lynnmcd

Reason as of yet unknown, it is at the other side of skyrim...

Pick Up the Bones 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10240 - Thanks rabidNode

Reason as of yet unknown, the above mod is purely changing static to pickupable so should not clash at all.

Vortai The home in the sky
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10214 - Thanks rabidNode

Reason as or yet unknown, The above image is not in the region of tamriel that I have built.

I will be hopefully working with the designers of these mods to find out the issues.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: VilniusNastavnik
